entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:53 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:53 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
